articles.title: Novo Nordisk invests $4bn to expand weight loss drug production in US - Financial Times
articles.description: Danish pharma group plans 1.4mn sq ft manufacturing plant in North Carolina to help meet surging demand
articles.content:
Novo Nordisk is investing $4.1bn to expand its US manufacturing and boost production of its blockbuster weight-loss drugs to meet surging demand.
The Danish pharma group said on Monday that the inve… [+2643 chars]

articles.title: Airbus provides 2024 guidance update - Airbus
articles.description: Airbus SE is providing a market update to report on new developments related to its space activities and commercial aircraft business, the impact of which is leading the Company to update its 2024 guidance.
articles.content:
